detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-animation-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-aspect-ratio-more';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-link';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-card-border-color';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-card-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-card-outlined';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-click-outside-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-styles';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-full-width';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-nesting';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-prevent';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        window.close();

</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-specific-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-dialog-sticky';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-customize';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react"; const DrawerDefault = () => { return
Drawer Content Toggle
; }; export default DrawerDefault;

import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const DrawerDefault = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid>      
      <Grid.Item xs="auto">        
        <Drawer animation="fade" size="200px" connector="drawer-default">          
          <Card>
            Drawer Content
          </Card>          
        </Drawer>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="grow">        
        <Card>          
          <Drawer.Toggler connector="drawer-default">
            Toggle
          </Drawer.Toggler>          
        </Card>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default DrawerDefault;

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-gutter-x';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-hide';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-offset';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-reverse';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-wrap';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-icon-custom-color';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      async function load() {

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-icon-size';

detail:
The intersection component observes the viewport and updates the status when the card component
enters or exits the viewport. (Its a component for detecting when elements are visible within the user's viewport).

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-intersection-lazy-image';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-portal-strategy';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Redirecting...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-scroll-indicator-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react";

const SpinnerColor = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-1"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-2"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-3"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-4"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-5"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default SpinnerColor;

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react"; const SpinnerType = () => { return
; }; export default SpinnerType;

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react";

const SpinnerType = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="default"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="double-bounce"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ripple"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="dual-ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="square"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default SpinnerType;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-spinner-type';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<html>
  <head>
    <title>Redirecting...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-top';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-switch-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-justify';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-separate';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-vertical';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react";

const TooltipArrows = () => {
  return <>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Default
      <Tooltip>        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Round
      <Tooltip arrow="round">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Large
      <Tooltip placement="bottom" arrow="large">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Small
      <Tooltip placement="top" arrow="small">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Wide
      <Tooltip placement="top" arrow="wide">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
    <button className="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
      Narrow
      <Tooltip placement="top" arrow="narrow">        Tooltip</Tooltip>      
    </button>    
  </>;
};

export default TooltipArrows;

        anchor.href = url;

      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="4">

      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="4">        
        <button>

        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="4">        
        <button>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tooltip-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Grid, Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react"; const TooltipTrigger = () => { return
; }; export default TooltipTrigger;

import { Grid, Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react";

const TooltipTrigger = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Hover
          <Tooltip trigger="hover">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Focus
          <Tooltip trigger="focus">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Click
          <Tooltip trigger="click">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default TooltipTrigger;
